author: agenda.visit@turismodeportugal.pt
title: Wine Alvarinho and Smokehouse Festival of Melgaço
text:
Wine Alvarinho and Smokehouse Festival of Melgaço
Wine Alvarinho and Smokehouse Festival of Melgaço
Events
This year's edition of the Wine Alvarinho and Smokehouse Festival of Melgaço takes place between the 25th and 27th of April. If you like gastronomy and wines, this is an event you can't miss, with product tastings, gastronomic days and taverns with some of the most typical dishes of the municipality.
This event, which began in 1995, began as a small local showcase of products in its first editions, but over the years it has become a major event, currently attracting thousands of people from all over the country and neighboring Galicia.
